vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀντί-θεσις, εως, ἡ,
opposition, [Refs 5th c.BC+]correspond to.., [Refs 4th c.BC+]; resistance, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__2 in Logic, opposition of propositions, in plural, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2.b substitution of the contradictory, as 'not-man' for 'man', ἡ σὺν -θέσει ἀντιστροφή, conversion by negation, e.g. 'man is an animal ∴ what is not an animal cannot be a man', [Refs]
__3 Rhet., antithesis, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; in forensic oratory, counter-proposition, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__4 Grammars, change or transposition of a letter,[Refs]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 還, 因, 作, 為
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 还, 因, 作, 为

vocabInfos.mediumDef: primarily opposition, objection; hence, a question proposed for dispute, disputation, 1Tim. 6:20*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cuộc tranh luận; cuộc tranh cãi
